<<<<<<< HEAD
Ecclesiastes The worthy church-man, or the faithfull minister of Iesvs Christ. Described by polishing the twelve stones in the high-priests pectorall, as they were first glossed and scholyed on in a Synod-sermon; and after enlarged by way of discourse, to his two brethren. By Iohn Iackson parson of Marske in Richmond-shire. Jackson, John, 1600-1648.
[10], 60 p.
Printed [by M. Flesher] for Richard More, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet, London : 1628.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

By Iohn Iackson parson of Marske in Richmond-shire. Jackson, John, 1600-1648.
[10], 60 p.
Printed [by M. Flesher] for Richard More, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet, London : 1628.
